channel.title: I Found the Hidden Hat! [Spoiler Image]
channel.description:
![](upload://628GD90dQHMDzqatleUFRwOq1Le.jpeg)
I was searching every nook and cranny for it, and then I randomly came across one place where I was like, "That would be a perfect spot to put the hat!" and BAM there it was!
I won't say where it was though, that would take all the fun out of it! Who else has found it? :freeman:

the first platform is the only one where it gets stuck. go to the bottom floor, and toss it next to the teleporter, so you can pick it up once you get there. then you can safely drop it in. mid floor platform will allow you to pick it up. it might glitch out ocasioanally, but not always like bottom platform. from the mid floor, you can toss it on to the top floor platform with a jump toss easily. it will always fall over if you try it through the teleport.

item.title: I Found the Hidden Hat! [Spoiler Image]
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
Just got it to the end finally, got the achievement, and the little extra bit after the credits was hilarious!

Did have some issues with the reactor core though, when I’d toss it through the portal to the next platform, it could still roll around on the platform, but I couldn’t pick it up. I had to shoot it a few times til it popped up into the air and I could grab it again.

Also, the reactor core was annoying in general because if you got too close to the back wall you’d randomly get killed. So fun. :what:

Oh, and the end portal raped my frame rate. I was pretty good all game and then BAM, down to like 4fps.

Now I’ll just have to do it all over when this gets on Steam. Oh god. Hahaha

Edit: And I was meaning to ask what the hat meant, but then randomly stumbled across the answer on Facebook. lol
